articles.title: SA vs IND 2023, 3rd ODI: Boland Park Pitch Report, Paarl Weather Forecast, ODI Stats & Records | South Africa vs India - Cricket Times
articles.description: South Africa will face India in the final ODI of the three-match series on Thursday. The high-stakes clash will take place at the Boland Park in Paarl.
articles.content:
South Africa will face India in the final ODI of the three-match series on Thursday (December 21). The contest will take place at Boland Park in Paarl.
